results.question: What are all the employee names?
How many employees work in the Engineering department?
results.sql: SELECT COUNT(T1.id) FROM employees AS T1 INNER JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.id WHERE T2.name = 'Engineering'

results.question: Who is the highest paid employee?
results.sql: SELECT name FROM employees ORDER BY salary DESC LIMIT 1

results.question: Which department has the highest total salary cost?
results.sql: SELECT T2.name FROM employees AS T1 INNER JOIN departments AS T2 ON T1.department_id = T2.id GROUP BY T2.name ORDER BY SUM(T1.salary) DESC LIMIT 1
